message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you first. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $14,000 is a fair reflection of its value, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we settle on $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $12,500, but I'm still a bit far off from that price. I'd be willing to meet you halfway, so how about $11,250?
Bob, you clearly see the value in this product. I'm trying to be flexible, but I need a price that reflects its worth.  Would you consider $11,750?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short of the budget. How about we meet at $11,000? That's the highest I can go.
